alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 9:32AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CENTRAL YAMPA RIVER BASIN COUNTY... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...This band of heavier snowfall is bringing slick roads to the U.S. Highway 40 corridor in the Central Yampa River Basin. This area is moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This band of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of Central Yampa River Basin County. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 80 and 95. Colorado 13 between mile markers 79 and 94. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of snowfall. Rapid changes in visibility and slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
